name: Memory Of Threes
description:
Memory, but you need to remember 3 card locations, not just 2!

And yes, the name is a pun on "Memory of TREES".

Still in development.

This game has it all!

  • Self created assets
  • Great soundtrack and sound effects!
  • Three three's, three times!
  • Color cycling animations!
  • Palm trees, because what is a game without coconuts?
  • And of course, 3 eyed DOGS!!!

Made during and for the third MicroStudio Jam, September 2022!

Make you own games with this amazing and FREE! online and offline dev tool!

https://microstudio.dev/
